text: Börje Ekedahl (August 21, 1928 - January 5, 2006) was a Swedish bobsledder who competed in the early 1950s. He finished seventh in the four-man event at the 1952 Winter Olympics in Oslo. ==References== *Bobsleigh four-man result: 1948-64 *Wallenchinsky, David (1984). "Bobsled: Four-man". In The Complete Book of the Olympics: 1896-1980. New York: Penguin Books. p. 561\. title: Börje Ekedahl
